bib.title: Similarity-based training set acquisition for continuous handwriting recognition
bib.author: Sas, Jerzy and Markowska-Kaczmar, Urszula
bib.abstract: In the paper we consider the problem of continuous handwriting segmentation into individual characters. The ultimate aim is to create the set of isolated character images used as a training set for the writer-dependent handwriting recognizer. Analytic approach is applied, where word recognition is based on the individual classification of characters.
